question: You recently stayed with a childhood friend for a few days.Write a letter to this friend. In your letter:Thank your friend for letting you stay with them.refer to something enjoyable that you did while staying with him/herinvite your friend to visit you
text: Hope you are doing well, say hello to your parents. I want to thank you for making my stay at your home most memorable and enjoyable.

The time I spent with you was amazing, I liked your city very much especially, the food you made was so tasty, I had a lot of fun with you in Snow world which made my moments most memorable and I am missing the evening walks to the park with you and watching tv shows as well.

Please allow me the pleasure to invite you to my place. I will take you to the famous museum near my home which may be helpful for your project as well and will go shopping together . Moreover, We will also meet our childhood friends and eat your favourite food in the restaurant.

Please let me know whenever you want to visit my place so that I can make arrangements. Feel free to bring your roommate as well so that he can have some exposure to my place and We all can have fun together.
